column3: There's Simplified Chinese language in 0.4.0, but not in 0.5.0, i think it should be there.\n

As a part of the move from wx to qt, all the existing translations were thrown out (because most of them became out-of-date).
I believe src/qt/bitcoin.qrc also needs updated to indicate the addition of the new translation.
In the future, you can also use https://www.transifex.net/projects/p/bitcoin/resource/tx/ to contribute updates to translations for bitcoin.
Nice, afaik tcatm merges all the transifex changes right before each release.\n
tcatm pulled this, it is in 0.5.1.\n
